title: Camera Tracking Shot
description: Indicate whether the camera actively follows the subject and identify the tracking style used.

questions.text: Does the camera track the moving subject(s)?
questions.display_text: Does the camera track the moving subject(s)?

questions.text: Is the camera side-tracking (moving alongside the subject)?
questions.display_text: Is the camera side-tracking (moving alongside the subject)?

questions.text: Is the camera tail-tracking (following behind the subject)?
questions.display_text: Is the camera tail-tracking (following behind the subject)?

questions.text: Is the camera lead-tracking (moving ahead of the subject)?
questions.display_text: Is the camera lead-tracking (moving ahead of the subject)?

questions.text: Is the camera aerial-tracking (from above, e.g., drone or crane)?
questions.display_text: Is the camera aerial-tracking (from above, e.g., drone or crane)?

questions.text: Is the camera arc-tracking (arcing around the subject)?
questions.display_text: Is the camera arc-tracking (arcing around the subject)?

questions.text: Is the camera pan-tracking (panning to follow the subject)?
questions.display_text: Is the camera pan-tracking (panning to follow the subject)?

questions.text: Is the camera tilt-tracking (tilting to follow the subject)?
questions.display_text: Is the camera tilt-tracking (tilting to follow the subject)?

questions.text: Does the size of the subject change during tracking?
questions.display_text: Does the size of the subject change during tracking?
